name: Siebel eScript: Avoid complex PreGetFieldValue Functions
associatedValueName: Number of lines of code in PreGetFieldValue
description:
This rule reports Business Components having a complex PreGetFieldValue, that is a numbef of line of code greater than "Max LoC for PreGetFieldValue function".
"Max LoC for PreGetFieldValue function" is a paramter and can be changed at will.
The default value is 50 LoC.
output:
This rule reports Business Components having a complex PreGetFieldValue (above X LoC). It displays:
- function full name
- the associated value is the Number of lines of code in PreGetFieldValue
rationale:
PreGetFieldValue is called every time the user interface is updated to repaint fields on the screen. Therefore, a script attached to this event runs very frequently, which may cause the computer to appear to be unresponsive.
Even empty scripts are invoked by the framework and thus cause a performance impact.
remediation: To remove an existing script from BusComp_PreInvokeMethod to improve performance, you must open the script in Siebel Tools and delete its entire contents, including the Function and End Function (Siebel VB) or function (){ and } (Siebel eScript) statements.
total: Number of added or modified Business Components
alternativeName: Siebel eScript: Avoid complex PreGetFieldValue Functions
